channel.title: Calvary Bible Church, Boulder, CO
channel.itunes:author: Tom Shirk
channel.itunes:subtitle: Sermons from Calvary Bible Church in Boulder and Erie, Colorado
channel.description: Calvary Bible Church is a multisite church located in Boulder and Erie, Colorado. If you are ever in Boulder or Erie come and check us out. These podcasts are some of the sermons that have been recorded during Sunday services.

item.title: Easter
item.itunes:author: Tom Shirk
item.itunes:subtitle: "You Shall Live Also"
item.itunes:summary: After a little while the world will behold Me no more; but you will behold Me; because I live, you shall live also. In that day you shall know that I am in My Father, and you in Me, and I in you. He who has My commandments and keeps them, he it is who loves Me; and he who loves Me shall be loved by My Father, and I will love him, and will disclose Myself to him. Judas (not Iscariot) said to Him, Lord, what then has happened that You are going to disclose Yourself to us, and not to the world? Jesus answered and said to him, If anyone loves Me, he will keep My word; and My Father will love him, and We will come to him, and make Our abode with him. He who does not love Me does not keep My words; and the word which you hear is not Mine, but the Father's who sent Me. -- John 14:19-24
